name: Moving out (RegulusBetelgeuse)
description:
Moving out - small demo project made in two weeks for a Unity course. The game tells the story of a dog who fell off a truck while moving to another house with the owner. On it's way to find the new home Doggy has to meet it's fears shaped as wild animals of the forest.

Controls:

WASD - move

Space (with yellow bones collected) - Sprint

Left mouse button - next sprite of story in the beginning

How to win? Find the exit from the forest, you will know when you meet it. Also, try to hide and to run away from the beasts
